languages.text: {n}Маражай с шипением прилаживает деталь на место и молча отворачивается, не удостаивая вас даже словом.{/n}
{n}With a hiss, Marazhai replaces the plate and turns around without a word, not dignifying you with a response.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай с шипением прилаживает деталь на место и молча отворачивается, не удостаивая вас даже словом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}With a hiss, Marazhai replaces the plate and turns around without a word, not dignifying you with a response.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}With a hiss, Marazhai replaces the plate and turns around without a word, not dignifying you with a response.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋哼了一声，换好了护甲板。随后，他一言不发地转过了身，没有给你任何回应。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a hiss, Marazhai replaces the plate and turns around without a word, not dignifying you with a response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋哼了一声，换好了护甲板。随后，他一言不发地转过了身，没有给你任何回应。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}シューという音を立ててマラズハイはプレートを元に戻し、何も言わずに振り向くが、敬いを持って返答することはなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a hiss, Marazhai replaces the plate and turns around without a word, not dignifying you with a response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}シューという音を立ててマラズハイはプレートを元に戻し、何も言わずに振り向くが、敬いを持って返答することはなかった。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Con un bufido, Marazhai vuelve a colocarse la pieza de la armadura y te da la espalda sin mediar palabra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a hiss, Marazhai replaces the plate and turns around without a word, not dignifying you with a response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un bufido, Marazhai vuelve a colocarse la pieza de la armadura y te da la espalda sin mediar palabra.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avec un sifflement contrarié, Marazhai remet la plaque en place et tourne les talons sans prendre la peine de vous répondre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a hiss, Marazhai replaces the plate and turns around without a word, not dignifying you with a response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un sifflement contrarié, Marazhai remet la plaque en place et tourne les talons sans prendre la peine de vous répondre.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai zischt und drückt die Platte wieder in Position. Dann dreht er sich um, ohne es für nötig zu halten, dir zu antworten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a hiss, Marazhai replaces the plate and turns around without a word, not dignifying you with a response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai zischt und drückt die Platte wieder in Position. Dann dreht er sich um, ohne es für nötig zu halten, dir zu antworten.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, tıslayarak plakayı yerine oturtuyor ve tek bir söz etmeden, seni bir cevapla yüceltmeden arkasını dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a hiss, Marazhai replaces the plate and turns around without a word, not dignifying you with a response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, tıslayarak plakayı yerine oturtuyor ve tek bir söz etmeden, seni bir cevapla yüceltmeden arkasını dönüyor.{/n}
